content: Is there a day of the week/month and time of day that would work best for running JupyterHub updates? Things that would maybe take around 20-60 minutes to do. Working on shrinking this, but there are a couple roadblocks for now. Just trying to get a sense in the community.
Does it need to be during working days/hours or can it be any time of day?
Any time really. My hours aren’t generally normal working hours anyway. That being said, I’d prefer reasonable hours either early or late.
